It runs from Gaur City in the north to Knowledge Park V in the south along the Noida-Greater Noida Link Road, and is divided into sectors such as Sector 1, 2, 3, 4, 16, Tech Zone, and others. The area, which is around 5 kilometres from Sector 121 in Noida, caters to the working class of Delhi and the NCR because of its low costs. Noida Extension is currently home to a slew of software firms, educational institutions, hospitals, shopping malls, and housing complexes. Because of its infrastructure development, Noida Extension has attracted a large number of individuals from all around the city and nation. The real estate market has risen dramatically as a result of this. Noida Extension and its neighbouring areas have progressively grown to become the epicentre of business and residential growth.
